Hariz Arthur Maloy, Independent Financial Advisor at Promiseland IndependentTop Contributor (Sep)Level 9. God of WisdomUpdated on 07 Jun 2019PMs/Commodities are a good asset to own. But storage is never easy. They hold value and adjust for inflation, but that's about it. You can't get rich from owning gold, silver, or platinum. You can stay rich by holding them instead. And usually in the anticipation of a recession and a weakening dollar, people can choose to hold PM instead as they are usually inversely correlated to USD and ride the wave.1 comment3
